price: then glorify the praise of your Lord, and ask His forgiveness. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
